name: Join our team!
description: Volunteer as an employee of Malou Pet Haven and help care for our furry family.

description: Meet adorable pets ready to find their forever homes. Chat with staff about adoption processes and pet care.

description: A charity fun run for pet owners and their furry friends, with proceeds benefiting the shelter.
